### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other drill found) 

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5 y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5 y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### Belt group at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)

### Pipe group at position(x=107.5 y=-34.5)
Consists of pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Electricity group at position(x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)


### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities have no fuel
-  Ensure that entities that require fuel have a sufficient fuel supply before attempting to use them.
-  Check the status of entities regularly to avoid running out of fuel.

### Errors when entities are not connected
-  Ensure that entities that require connection to other entities are properly connected before attempting to use them.
-  Check the status of entities regularly to avoid connection issues.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
-  Ensure that entities that require ingredients have a sufficient supply of ingredients before attempting to use them.
-  Check the status of entities regularly to avoid running out of ingredients.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
-  Ensure that entities that require connection to the electric network are properly plugged in before attempting to use them.
-  Check the status of entities regularly to avoid connection issues.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
